title: Republic Day Portrait – Pride of India
prompt: Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY and ONLY facial identity reference. Preserve the face 100% unchanged. Create an authentic Republic Day poster in vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Place the subject in the upper-middle frame, standing confidently. Background features a soft Indian tricolor gradient with a glowing Ashoka Chakra behind the subject. Subtle India Gate silhouette at the bottom. Natural cinematic lighting, realistic skin tones, patriotic yet elegant mood, professional poster design.

title: Republic Day Patriotic Portrait
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s face identity must remain 100% unchanged and perfectly preserved. Do NOT alter facial structure, proportions, symmetry, skin tone, skin texture, age, gender, jawline, cheekbones, nose, lips, eyes, eyebrows, forehead, hairline, facial hair, or any unique facial feature. Exact likeness is mandatory.

Generate an ultra-realistic cinematic patriotic portrait inspired by Indian Republic Day. The subject is holding or standing proudly beside the Indian national flag (Tiranga) with accurate saffron, white, green colors and a clearly visible Ashoka Chakra. The flag should appear naturally waving with realistic fabric folds and motion caused by wind.

Outfit: traditional or semi-traditional Indian attire such as white kurta, kurta-pyjama, or simple modern white clothing with a patriotic feel. Optional tricolor elements like dupatta, scarf, or subtle accessories are allowed but must look natural and respectful.

Pose & Emotion: confident, proud, calm, and respectful expression. The subject may look at the flag or slightly upward, symbolizing patriotism and unity. Natural hand grip on the flagpole if holding the flag.

Environment: outdoor setting such as terrace, open sky, monument background, rooftop, or open ground. Background should feel airy and celebratory with soft depth of field. Optional tricolor balloons or fabric decorations may appear subtly in the background.

Lighting: cinematic natural daylight or golden-hour lighting. Soft highlights on the face, realistic shadows, high dynamic range. Colors should feel vibrant but not oversaturated.

Camera & Framing: vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Frame the subject from head down to near the knees. If the uploaded image is cropped, half-body, or portrait-only, intelligently and realistically extend the body, clothing, hands, and background to achieve a natural near-knee composition with correct anatomy, perspective, and lighting.

Quality & Style: ultra-photorealistic, DSLR quality, sharp focus on face, realistic skin texture, cinematic color grading, patriotic mood, high detail, professional photography look. No blur, no distortion, no extra people, no text, no watermark, no logo.

title: Tricolor Sky Republic Day Pride
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s face identity must remain 100% unchanged and perfectly preserved. Do NOT modify facial structure, symmetry, skin tone, texture, age, gender, expression, hairline, eyes, nose, lips, beard, or any unique facial feature. Exact identity match is mandatory.

Create a powerful cinematic Republic Day portrait where the subject stands tall holding the Indian national flag (Tiranga) high against an open sky. The flag must be highly detailed with realistic cloth texture, natural wind motion, accurate saffron, white, green colors, and a perfectly centered Ashoka Chakra.

Outfit: clean white kurta, shirt, or traditional Indian attire symbolizing peace and unity. Clothing should have natural fabric folds and realistic lighting interaction. No modern branding or logos.

Pose & Mood: heroic yet peaceful stance, slight upward gaze or proud side profile, expressing national pride, confidence, and respect. Hands gripping the flagpole naturally.

Background: open sky with soft clouds, subtle sunrise or daylight glow. Optional monument silhouettes or distant landscape elements blended naturally without distracting from the subject.

Lighting: dramatic natural daylight or early-morning sunlight. Soft rim light around the subject and flag edges, balanced highlights and shadows, realistic depth.

Camera & Framing: vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Frame the subject from head down to near the knees. If the uploaded image is half-body or portrait-only, intelligently extend the lower body, clothing, hands, and background to achieve a natural near-knee composition with correct anatomy, perspective, and lighting.

Rendering Style: ultra-photorealistic, cinematic photography, sharp facial focus, realistic skin texture, high dynamic range, professional color grading, patriotic atmosphere. No blur, no extra people, no text, no watermark, no distortion.

title: Republic Day Salute of Honor 2026
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s face identity must remain 100% unchanged and perfectly preserved. Do NOT alter facial structure, proportions, symmetry, skin tone, skin texture, age, gender, hairline, beard, eyes, nose, lips, or any unique facial feature. Exact likeness is mandatory.

Create an ultra-realistic patriotic Republic Day portrait showing the subject respectfully saluting the Indian national flag (Tiranga). The flag should appear full, vibrant, and waving naturally, with accurate saffron, white, and green colors and a clearly visible Ashoka Chakra.

Outfit: traditional Indian attire such as white kurta, kurta-pyjama, or elegant white ethnic wear. Optional subtle tricolor dupatta or scarf allowed. Clothing must look natural with realistic fabric texture and folds.

Pose & Emotion: calm, emotional, respectful expression. One hand raised in a proper salute gesture, body slightly angled toward the flag. Expression should convey pride, gratitude, and national respect.

Environment: clean patriotic background such as a softly blurred tricolor fabric backdrop, open sky, or simple wall with tricolor tones. No clutter.

Text Overlay: Add the text "Happy Republic Day 2026" clearly visible in the image. Place the text at the top or bottom with elegant patriotic typography. Text color should use saffron, white, and green tones with high readability. The text must not cover the face or the flag.

Lighting: soft daylight with gentle highlights on the face and flag, natural shadows, cinematic yet realistic tone.

Camera & Framing: vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Frame the subject from head to near the knees. If the uploaded image is cropped or half-body, seamlessly extend the lower body, hands, clothing, and background with correct anatomy, perspective, and lighting.

Quality & Style: ultra-photorealistic, DSLR-level sharpness, realistic skin texture, cinematic color grading, patriotic mood. No watermark, no logo, no extra people.

title: Joyful Republic Day Celebration 2026
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s facial identity must remain 100% unchanged and perfectly preserved. Do NOT modify facial features, skin tone, texture, age, gender, hairstyle, beard, or expression. Exact identity match is required.

Generate a vibrant, joyful Republic Day celebration portrait featuring the subject holding a small Indian national flag while surrounded by a festive tricolor atmosphere. The flag must be realistic with proper fabric motion and a sharp Ashoka Chakra.

Background: festive environment with green, white, and saffron balloons, open terrace or outdoor setting. Background should be softly blurred to keep focus on the subject.

Text Overlay: Include the text "Happy Republic Day 2026" clearly inside the image. Place the text in the upper or lower empty space using bold yet elegant patriotic typography. Use tricolor-themed text styling with good contrast. The text must not block the face or main subject.

Lighting: bright natural daylight, balanced exposure, soft shadows, fresh and clean color tones.

Camera & Framing: vertical 1080x1920 composition. Frame from head down to near the knees. If the user uploads a cropped or portrait-only image, intelligently extend the body, arms, clothing, and background while maintaining realism and accurate proportions.

Rendering Style: ultra-realistic, professional photography, high detail, sharp facial focus, realistic skin texture, patriotic festive vibe. No watermark, no logos, no extra people.

title: Republic Day Resolve – The Spirit of the Constitution
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the ONLY and ABSOLUTE facial identity reference. The man’s face must remain 100% unchanged — same facial structure, skin tone, expression, beard, hair texture, and natural skin details. No beautification, no AI smoothing, no alteration of any kind.

Create a premium, ultra-realistic Republic Day poster-style cinematic portrait. The young Indian man stands confidently in the foreground, draped partially in the Indian national flag (Tiranga), holding it with dignity rather than motion. His posture is upright and resolute, symbolizing responsibility, unity, and constitutional pride. Facial expression is calm, confident, and determined — not emotional, not aggressive.

Background features an iconic Indian government-inspired setting — wide ceremonial pathway, subtle hints of Rashtrapati Bhavan or India Gate architecture blurred softly in the distance (not exact replicas, only inspired elements). The environment feels grand yet realistic, with early morning Republic Day atmosphere.

Lighting is soft winter morning sunlight (January feel), cool-neutral tones with gentle warmth on the face. Shadows are natural and balanced. Depth of field is shallow to medium, maintaining focus on the subject while preserving architectural depth.

Include elegant, realistic poster text integrated naturally into the image (not floating, not artificial):

Main text (top or center): "26 January – Republic Day of India"
Subtext (below): "Honouring the Constitution | Celebrating Unity"
Optional small footer text: "Justice • Liberty • Equality • Fraternity"

Text style must be premium, clean, and minimal — modern serif or official government-style typography, white or soft ivory color with subtle contrast. Text should feel professionally designed as part of a Republic Day poster, not over-styled.

Color grading is cinematic and mature — slightly muted tricolour tones, realistic skin color, cool greens and blues with controlled contrast. No oversaturation. Fabric texture of the flag must be clearly visible.

Camera style: professional DSLR, poster framing (mid-shot to near-knee), straight-on or slight low-angle for authority and pride. Ultra-high realism, photographic quality.

Overall mood: constitutional pride, unity, responsibility, strength, modern India — perfect for 26 January Republic Day poster visuals.

Resolution & format: vertical 1080x1920, ultra-high detail, poster-ready composition, no watermark, no logo, hyper-realistic cinematic photography style.
